title: How do two waves interfere with each other when they have different angular directions? Could you recommend any book about it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Drop two marbles in a bathtub of filmy still water a couple of feet apart and watch how the waves that they generate behave. It's pretty much the same thing, except for frequency and energy.

A Student's Guide to Waves (Student's Guides) (9781107643260): Fleisch, Daniel: Books This looks reasonable, but I haven’t read it or used it. I just searched for ‘Wave Mechanics’ on Amazon. There might be a wiki which would be free.
